name: Import VK
author: Vadim Alekseyenko

sections.description:
With this plugin you can easily import any VKontakte posts into your WordPress site.

Working with plugin

  • After installation you should go to the plugin’s page in the Tools section.
  • Enter vk.com page address to load data.
  • Choose posts range to import.
  • You can also set the target records type (post, page) and their initial state (draft, publish).
  • Finally, click the Import button and wait until the end of operation.
sections.installation: Install the plugin through the WordPress installer or copy the plugin’s files into your site’s /wp-content/plugins/ folder and then activate it via the control panel.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install the plugin through the WordPress installer or copy the plugin’s files into your site’s /wp-content/plugins/ folder and then activate it via the control panel.

short_description: Importing VKontakte (vk.com) posts into your WordPress site.
description:
With this plugin you can easily import any VKontakte posts into your WordPress site.

Working with plugin

  • After installation you should go to the plugin’s page in the Tools section.
  • Enter vk.com page address to load data.
  • Choose posts range to import.
  • You can also set the target records type (post, page) and their initial state (draft, publish).
  • Finally, click the Import button and wait until the end of operation.
